column5: We're going up there at the end of the month.  Just curious to know how the fishing is so far this year.

We fished Nipissing from Jan 1 to Jan 5.We fished out of the calander area with Rob's ice huts. We had a great time but fishing was abit slower then we had hoped.All and all we did well but we didnt see any huge numbers like they saw last year this time. We ended up with 25 walleye biggest being just shy of 8lbs and around 20 pike the biggest being 29 inches. We also caught a 12 perch and bunch of herring or siscos. This was between 4 guys fishing hard. They gold mr. champ with pin heads seamed to be the best. Hope you do well  magic
my buddy put his shack out on friday 4 of them pulled up 20 pickeral and 21 perch in 2 days of fishing 12 hours in total 3 in the slot and 18 keepers.
My shack is along the South Shore.  We have been catching lots of perch but not many eyes'
What size Mr. Champ were you using Magic?
